description: Digitized version of attendees found here: http://www.cpsc.gov/en/Regulations-Laws--Standards/CPSIA/Phthalates/Chronic-Hazard-Advisory-Panel-CHAP-on-Phthalates/. Hand entered by Sunlight Foundation. In some cases, names were illegible. In these cases fields are left blank. "Type" codes were added by Sunlight.
